rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entry area with reception counter and sitting area; designed to set the tone for luxury and traditional aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Large open-plan space combining living room, dining area and a small kitchenette; ideal for joint family gatherings.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable master suite with an attached bathroom, walk-in closet and private terrace view of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Sizable room designed for guests or joint family members, featuring a modern en-suite bath.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom for children with ample space and built-in storage; maintains Chettinad style decor.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom facility designed in traditional Indian style with modern fittings, located conveniently within the ground floor.

rooms.name: Utility & Service Area
rooms.description: Includes kitchen, laundry, storage and pantry areas; designed to maintain an organized and efficient layout.

openings.details: Double-height door with Chettinad-inspired ironwork detailing; provides a grand entrance following Vastu principles (ensuring positive energy flow).
Large openings connecting to the central courtyard, ensuring natural light and ventilation across the floor.
Customized windows with traditional lattice work; placed according to Vastu guidelines for optimal sunlight and energy flow.
